title: Keir Starmer – 2023 Comments on Volodymyr Zelenskyy Speaking to the Houses of Parliament
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 8 February 2023.
content:
It’s an honour to be in Parliament today as we are addressed by President Zelenskyy.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance

  *[SEND]: special educational needs and/or disabilities
  *[EEF]: the Education Endowment Foundation
  *[DfE]: Department for education
  *[

 ]: education inspection framework

As a country, we are at our best when we unite to confront tyrannical aggression.

Our duty now is to stand on the shoulders of giants who came before and support Ukraine’s fight for liberty and victory.
